title.rendered: VICTORIA/TOMAS FALL/WINTER COLLECTION 2022-2023 for Paris Fashion Week 2022

content.rendered: THE VICTORIA/TOMAS FALL/WINTER COLLECTION IS A PUZZLE WITHOUT THE INSTRUCTION. THERE IS A COMPLETE IMAGE THAT EXISTS, BUT WE HAD TO FOLLOW OUR INTUITION. DURING THIS WORK, WE SAW THE METAMORPHOSIS OF THE GIRL BECOMING A WOMAN AND A BOY BECOMING A MAN, YET KEEPS THE SPARKLE OF A CHILDISH DREAM. WE WERE EXPERIMENTING THE ELEGANCE AND THE CLASSICS TO DEFINE A STRONG DNA OF VICTORIA/TOMAS.

excerpt.rendered: THE VICTORIA/TOMAS FALL/WINTER COLLECTION IS A PUZZLE WITHOUT THE INSTRUCTION. THERE IS A COMPLETE IMAGE…
